name: Archaene
description:
Hello and welcome everyone!

Archaene is a Sci-fi FPS project where you play as a hired Space Mercenary. In this demo you are on a mission to hack and steal the dataplan from the big corporationscalled Extrago-IO. Your goal is to fight your way through the compound, collect the datapads and hack the main terminal to steal the dataplan.

I hope you all will enjoy playing this game as much as I do!

Controls:
Movement, WASD
Shoot: LMB
Aim: RMB
Weapon wheel: Hold Tab (hover mouse over selected weapon and let tab go)
Run: Shift
Jump: Space
Interaction key: E
Reload: R

In the future I would love to continue to develop on this game and make it a propper full release. You can donate to keep the project alive.
